title: Choice Set
description: A primitive array of available choices. Any array defaults to AND, and as such, there is no AND operator.

choice.description: WIP - A choice that can be made. In the future we may instead use a more complex object to represent a choice, like a feat and source, but for now this is just a string.

or.description: An array of choices that can be made. If any of the choices are made, the OR operator is satisfied.

not.description: An array of choices that are *excluded*. If none of the choices are made, the NOT operator is satisfied.
